ActivityMetric.name: ActivityMetric
ActivityMetric.description: Represents activities that were added to Salesforce automatically by Einstein Activity Capture and manually by users.

BaseId.description: The ID of the record that the activities apply to.

BaseType.description: The entity that corresponds to the BaseId

FirstCallDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the first call was made. This field is available only to Sales Engagement users. Einstein Activity Capture and Activity Metrics aren’t required.

FirstEmailDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the first email was sent. This field is available only to Sales Engagement users. Einstein Activity Capture and Activity Metrics aren’t required.

InactiveDays.description: Indicates the number of days since the most recent activity was completed. This field is derived from the Last Activity Date field.

LastActivityDateLastModDate.description: Indicates when the LastActivityDateTime field was last modified.

LastActivityDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the most recent activity was completed.

LastCallDateLastModDate.description: Indicates when the LastCallDateTime field was last modified.

LastCallDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the most recent call was made through Sales Dialer or Inbox.

LastEmailDateLastModDate.description: Indicates when the LastEmailDateTime field was last modified.

LastEmailDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the most recent email was sent or received.

LastEmailReceivedDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the most recent email was received.Available in API version 54.0 and later.

LastEmailSentDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the most recent email was sent.Available in API version 54.0 and later.

LastEventDateLastModDate.description: Indicates when the LastEventDateTime field was last modified.

LastEventDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the most recent event was completed.

LastTaskDateLastModDate.description: Indicates when the LastTaskDateTime field was last modified.

LastTaskDateTime.description: Indicates the date when the last task was completed.

NextActivityDateLastModDate.description: Indicates when the NextActivityDateTime field was last modified.

NextActivityDateTime.description: Indicates the date of the next scheduled task or event. Only open tasks in the future are included.
